meanings.definition: past tense and past participle of make
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I made a cake for my friend's birthday.
meanings.sent2: She made a beautiful painting for the art show.
meanings.sent3: The magician made a rabbit appear out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: His words made her heart skip a beat.
meanings.sent5: The chef made a delicious meal that everyone enjoyed.

meanings.definition: created or formed by combining materials or parts
meanings.sent1: The tailor displayed a made-to-order suit in the window.
meanings.sent2: The students admired the handmade decorations in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The robot costume was a made creation of wires and metal.
meanings.sent4: The cake was a made masterpiece of sugar and flour.
meanings.sent5: The house was a made structure of bricks and wood.
